stringForNode

public static java.lang.String stringForNode(com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Node n,
                                             com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.serializer.SerializationContext context,
                                             com.hp.hpl.jena.query.QuerySolutionMap map)
This method makes the difference between a normal serialization and a variable-replacement-serialization... What a hassle ;-) We could just have used QueryExecution.setInitialBinding(QuerySolution binding), but that does not allow us to see the filled-in query, and doesn't allow us to replace variables with property-paths (as those are no RDFNodes).
